description: Test file for a React Tic Tac Toe application, containing unit tests for rendering, gameplay, reset functionality, and draw detection.

methods.name: render
methods.description: Render React component into the virtual DOM for testing.

methods.name: screen.getByText
methods.description: Retrieve DOM element with matching text content.

methods.name: screen.getAllByRole
methods.description: Retrieve all DOM elements matching the specified role.

methods.name: fireEvent.click
methods.description: Simulate a click event on a DOM element.

methods.name: expect
methods.description: Assert that a certain condition holds in the test.
